column4: after installing kde i tried to run the session in kde....it came up with a wizard where it asked me to select the type - option were KDE, Windows, mc os and something else i select mc....now how can i select KDE ??
it is all kde, just differnt decoration styles OF kde
i believe there is a default choice
and even if the one you pick is not the one you want, you can always change it at the themes settings manager
